meanings.definition: Hypertext Markup Language: a standardized system for tagging text files to achieve font, color, graphic, and hyperlink effects on World Wide Web pages.
meanings.sent1: I learned how to create a webpage using html.
meanings.sent2: Web developers use html to structure the content of websites.
meanings.sent3: The html code decided to throw a party for the CSS and JavaScript.
meanings.sent4: In the digital world, html acts as the backbone of web design.
meanings.sent5: Understanding html is like learning the alphabet of the internet.
